content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.14 October 21, 2024—Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.14 includes enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates for Service Gateway. This update includes the following changes: This update adds support for deploying the Service Gateway virtual appliance on the Nutanix AHV (QCOW2) platform. This update ensures additional route configurations remain persistent after a Service Gateway reboot or upgrade. This update provides a workaround for the SG-APL log rotation failure issue. This update increases the password complexity requirements. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
